# Artist Roulette Exercise Generator

React + Vite + TypeScript project for generating random art exercise combinations.

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Vite
- pnpm (package manager)
- CSS Modules for styling

## Features
- 4 animated roulette wheels (Tool, Style, Subject, Support)
- Individual spin buttons
- "Spin All" button
- Keyboard shortcuts (Space to spin all)
- Color-coded results
- Confetti celebration animation
- Responsive design
